MonsterTrait.Name: Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text:
Naxene is a 6th level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13; +5 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation 1st level (4 slots): mage armor, magic missile, shield 2nd level (3 slots): misty step, suggestion 3rd level (3 slots): fly, lightning bolt

MonsterTrait.Name: Roleplaying Information
MonsterTrait.Text:
Goldenfields' crops are vital Waterdeep's survival, which is why the Watchful Order of Magists and Protectors sent Naxene to make sure the temple-farm is adeuately defended. At first she regarded the task as a punishment, but now she appreciates the peace and quiet.
Ideal: "There's no problem that can't be solved with magic." Bond: "I have great respect for Lady Laeral Silverhand of Waterdeep. She and the Lords' Alliance are going to bring some much-needed order to this lawless land." Flaw: "I'm too smart to be wrong about anything."

MonsterAction.Name: Staff
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 2 (1d6-1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8-1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.
